segments.text: This scene is just a disaster waiting to happen, I can feel it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is flowing relentlessly, making the floor a dangerous slick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Anyone could slip and fall on that wet surface, especially the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy, teetering precariously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's clearly unstable; I can see it wobbling from here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's going to tumble backward if he isn't careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman, still polishing her plate, completely oblivious to everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so frustrated to see such a lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The combination of these elements creates such a high risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could just shout a warning into the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All those dishes stacked by the sink could easily be shattered.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage alone will be extensive, it's a real mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just an accident waiting for its moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
